title: ICICI-Videocon loan case: Chanda Kochhar, husband Deepak Kochhar likely to be released today
description: ​​Deepak Kochhar is lodged in Arthur Road Jail in central Mumbai, while Chanda Kochhar is housed in the nearby Byculla women's prison.

title: Differences in gut microbiome linked to risk of death in COVID-19 patients with respiratory failure
description: Research published in Nature Communications shows that the composition of gut microbiota and the metabolites they produce can predict the trajectory of respiratory function and death in patients with severe COVID-19. This suggests that the gut microbiome has …

title: ‘Anomaly’ thwarts UK attempt to put satellites into space
description: Rocket carried beneath the wing of a modified Boeing 747 separated from the aircraft but failed to reach orbit.
